metadata.description:
Thank you for considering purchase of this NFT.

49% of proceeds will go to a charity chosen by the most famous person I know (if that person doesn't respond to me, I'll try someone else of considerable fame, and so on).

Though conceived and produced by Darren Bader, this video isn't an official Darren Bader [Moses Hosiery] artwork. That really shouldn't matter--content speaks for itself (says Darren Bader); value has all sorts of variations, connotations, fluctuations, etcations (says Darren Bader). And who wants a Darren Bader artwork anyway?

23% percent of proceeds will go to the cause promoted by the final unsold NFT presented on www.posthibernaljournal.events (if this NFT is the final unsold NFT, I will donate to both a prison reform and marine conservation NFPOs).

22% percent of proceeds will go to keeping "Spring Cleaning and/or Post-Hibernal Journal" afloat for at least another month. www.vrnljrnl.org

2.3% percent of proceeds will go to a charity of my mother's choosing.
2.2% percent of proceeds will go to a charity of my brother's choosing.
1.1% percent of proceeds will go to a charity of another's choosing.
All remaining proceeds will likely (have) be(en) used for gas.
metadata.name: Fund Raisin (Land (Ho(!)))
